column3:
Notes
1. Create a separate time period if no data reported for 4 or more consecutive weeks (time periods coded by incarcerated population data standards, not staff data.)
2. U (reported as unavailable): Mark as unreported
3. If data is reported on a website, include the website link or any relevant documents in the "Notes" column
4. Code any unknown frequency as 0
